q: Do you bring your own products and tools?
a: Yes, we bring professional products, pads and HEPA vacuum. Tell us about delicate finishes ahead of time.

q: What if my agent asks for changes?
a: We include a 7-day re-clean support window to align with agent feedback for the items in our checklist.
Yes, we carry public liability cover. We work carefully and spot-test where needed.
